output.title: output
output.description:
The action will return event details in the format:

[{
  "eventId": "a0E1e0000012348",
  "eventName": "Salesforce Lightning Workshop",
  "startDateTime": "2024-08-10T13:00:00.000Z",
  "endDateTime": "2024-08-10T17:00:00.000Z",
  "eventDurationDays": 0,
  "eventDurationHours": 4.0
}]
